name: LittleFallsGauge
0:
”Alexa, ask Little Falls Gauge for the level”
”Alexa, ask Little Falls Gauge what's running”
”Alexa, ask Little Falls Gauge for the water temp”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: little falls gauge
des: This skill allows you to query the latest information for the Potomac River as measured by the USGS gauge located at Little Falls near Brookmont, MD. The skill provides the level in feet, the flow rate in CFS, and the water temp in degrees Fahrenheit. It will also provide a list of runs and play spots on the Potomac in the DC area.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
